text: First to touch the bedroom door and come back
First to do 5 squats and tap Done
First to grab something red and show it
First to touch the light switch and come back
First to bring any shoe to your partner
First to spin around 3 times and tap Done
First to touch your partner's nose
First to lie on the bed and sit back up
First to touch the floor with both hands
First to bring a pillow not on the bed
First to do 3 push-ups and tap Done
First to find something made of metal
